        A box made of metallic card stock - GRAN RESERVA NOUVEAU & GRAN RESERVA NOUVEAU BOURGOGNE
5 extra cards depicting Spanish characters and suits - "Isabella I of Castile" as Queen of "Bastos" + "Rodrigo Díaz de Vivar (aka el Cid)" as Jack of "Espadas" + "King Philip II" as King of "Copas" + Ace of "Oros" + "Il Capitano" as the Joker + Back
What Gran Reserva consists of:
GRAN RESERVA NOUVEAU
GRAN RESERVA NOUVEAU BOURGOGNE
A box made of metallic card stock, with a double layer and laser cut design. Note that both layers and the entire box will be metallic card stock.
IMPORTANT: This is a concept and it's subject to minor changes, which I'll be updating you about along the way. 
A signed and hand numbered deck. 
5 extra cards depicting Spanish characters and suits and different back. The 330gsm Superior smooth card stock will be used for these extra cards. 
Both NOUVEAU and BOURGOGNE are available to choose between (you can add both). The colours used for the box will depend on the deck you choose. 
The price is $60 + $10 (shipping worldwide). You can add one of each, in which case you'll be paying for only one shipping of $10 ($60 + $60 + $10).
It will be mailed from Barcelona, Spain (so it will be separate from the main decks).
**NEW**: Signed and hand numbered ribbon + handmade custom wax seal
***IMPORTANT***Note that no more than 50 decks of each will be available. Once 50 of each edition are sold, that version will be marked "SOLD OUT!" and we'll post an update letting backers know about it and no further orders will be taken.
***IMPORTANT***Please, PM us after you've increased your pledge and if you just add one Gran Reserva deck, make sure to specify which one do you want.
NOUVEAU Playing Cards is inspired by the historical and mythological heroes and heroines traditionally featured in the French playing cards since the 16th century. The art style and design pay tribute to the philosophical and artistic trend Art nouveau, promoted and popularized in France in the late 19th century.  
NOUVEAU, chosen as the official United Cardists 2016 Annual Deck, is a custom deck of playing cards (poker size) designed by Bona fide Playing Cards and manufactured by Expert Playing Card Company.
NOUVEAU & NOUVEAU BOURGOGNE (scroll down to stretch goals to see more on BOURGOGNE deck)
Prototype
100% Custom playing cards deck
Limited Edition (one printing, never to be reprinted)
Poker size
54 cards
Printed by EPCC
Master Finish quality
Official United Cardists 2016 Annual deck.
Prototype
The playing cards as we know them today are inspired by the designs produced in Rouen, France, back in the 16th century. There are different theories about who the court cards represent, though it’s hard to find a widely accepted one as the Rouen cards were so badly copied that the current designs are gross distortions of the original cards. For NOUVEAU, we decided on the historical and mythological characters some believe were used for the creation of the first decks in Rouen. Considering that, our deck faces go like this:

King of Diamonds as Roman leader Julius Caesar 
Queen of Diamonds as the biblical character Rachel 
Jack of Diamonds as the Greek mythological hero and prince Hector 
King of Clubs as the Greek King Alexander the Great 
Queen of Clubs as Eleanor of Aquitaine 
Jack of Clubs as the legendary Knight Sir Lancelot 
King of Hearts as the King Charlemagne 
Queen of Hearts as the biblical character Judith 
Jack of Hearts as the French military commander Étienne de Vignolles (aka La Hire) 
King of Spades as the biblical King David 
Queen of Spades as the Greek goddess Pallas Athena 
Jack of Spades as the legendary character Ogier the Dane
Our jokers represent Pierrot and Harlequin (both stock characters in the Italian Comedia dell’arte) popularized in Paris in the late 19c.
Regarding the meaning of the suits, we can find just as many theories as for who the court cards represent. We decided on one of the most spread ones regarding the original French suits, where Spades were believed to represent nobility, Hearts the clergy, Diamonds the merchants and Clubs the commoners and the peasantry.
As for the art style, we thought something of French inspiration was the best idea as we’re paying tribute to the original French deck. It was a hard decision, taking into account that France was always known as a place of artistic reference, so after some thought we chose to use one that was popular during the 19th century: Art Nouveau
Art Nouveau is a style of decorative art, architecture and design promoted and popularized in Paris in the late 19th century and characterized by intricate linear designs and flowing curves based on natural forms.
NOUVEAU Uncut sheet
Prototype

                                         "The end of the story of this deck is a happy ending. It was for me a real satisfaction to know that NOUVEAU will become the deck of the year of our friend forum United Cardists. After Grotesque (2014) and Delirium (2015), Mike Ratledge will produce Nouveau as the United Cardists symbol for the next year." She is the first female artist for the UC annual deck series, as well. She joins a list of world-renowned deck artists who have contributed to our annual deck series, such as Randy Butterfield, Lotrek and Giovanni Meroni." Ivan Choe
http://www.kardify.com/2015/09/first-look-nouveau-playing-cards-by.html

"Fully custom and beautifully crafted, the NOUVEAU courts feature historical and mythological characters such as biblical King David, Greek goddess Pallas Athena, Roman leader Julius Caesar, legendary Knight Sir Lancelot and many more! The suits themselves represent different Social Orders. For example, Spades represent nobility, Hearts the clergy, Diamonds the merchants and Clubs the commoners and the peasantry." Anthony Ingrassia

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our first playing cards project and, like any other product, there always were, are and will be risks bringing it onto the market. However, we are positive our hard work and dedication will bring this project to life, making it the first in a long list of decks created by Bona Fide Playing Cards.

Note: the pictures and renderings show the best true colors intended, but slight variances between the RGB (computer pictures) and CYMK (printing process used for playing cards) may occur.

About the production and delivery: Once and if the project is backed, there can always happen unforeseen complications during the production and delivery process. Taking that into account, we've left a generous amount of time to ensure the production and delivery of all the items without delay. The deck will be printed by Expert Playing Card Company and fulfilled by Gamblers Warehouse. The delivery date is estimated and it depends on the company as the artwork is already finished, even if it’s subject to some changes during the campaign. In any case, we’ll be updating our backers about the process.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

The ship docks tomorrow evening around 9PM PDT (in Los Angeles), so we hope that the trucking to Gambler's Warehouse in Texas won't add more than another week, and we can announce that shipping will begin in about ten days! Hopefully, even if that slips about a week, you should start seeing shipments arrive in your mailbox around the 25th of this month, for the US. Overseas shipping always adds around two weeks to delivery time, unfortunately nothing we can do because it's primarily due to the customs and tax authorities in the receiving countries. Actually, Karin (the artist) in Spain is amongst the absolute worst as far as getting things by mail: I shipped her a 22# (10kg) box of paper (not kidding - 100% paper!) and it took nearly a full month from the time it hit the post office here until it arrived on her doorstep. "Your mileage _WILL_ vary!" - it always does.

The decks get loaded on the ocean freight ship today, with IMO 9532795 for tracking on either VesselFinder.com or MarineTracker.com websites and Android / iOS apps. Right now, as soon as it's finished loading the APL Antwerp will head across the Pacific Ocean for North America, with the last leg of the journey being trucked to the Gambler's Warehouse fulfillment center in Texas for delivery to backers. If the ship gets the usual speed it should be in port in a little over three weeks here in the states. Remember that Gran Reserva decks must be sent from Texas to Barcelona for final assembly and then mailed worldwide from Spain, so it will almost certainly be the last part of the project delivered due to the crazy amount of time Spanish customs takes. This is no joke, I sent Karin 22# (10kg) of absolutely nothing but paper, and it took 15 days to clear customs in Madrid before it was delivered to her in Barcelona.

campaign.story:
UPDATE: You can now add on any previous Vanda decks for only $5 each. Read update #9 for more details.
UPDATE: We're unlocking the poker chips early. You can add them to any pledge level by managing your pledge and increasing your backing amount to include as shown below:
UPDATE: Free poker chips for all backers of $24 or more who also back Grinders Playing Cards. 
Details here.
After working on this project for over a year, we are excited to announce Duel, the first deck of the Vanda Artists Series. These fun & playful Harlequin-inspired playing cards are designed by Joelle Wall, a London-based graphic designer & illustrator whose work has been honored with numerous awards from FPO Awards, The Advertising & Design Club of Canada, Graphis, RGD Ontario, and the Adobe Design Achievement Awards.
Duel will be printed by the United States Playing Card Company (USPC) on Bicycle stock with Magic Finish. They will be a limited edition of 2500 decks. These are the best quality cards available, as used by most cardists, magicians, and Las Vegas casinos.
The initial campaign goal will cover the production of the red edition of this deck, with a stretch goal to also produce the blue edition. We've built out some other very exciting stretch goals - see below for details.
Uncut sheet - available in the $54 reward tier.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
After producing 8 decks of cards with the United States Playing Card Company (USPC), we've got all the logistics figured out. We learned a lot during our first few Kickstarter campaigns and at this point fulfillment is a well-oiled machine.

We've been careful with this campaign to ensure that any accessories / stretch goals won't cause unexpected complications during fulfillment and expect to ship out rewards in a very timely manner.

If you have any concerns or questions, please send us an email at ace@vandacards.com and we'll get back to you ASAP.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey all,
In finalizing the order with USPC, I discovered they are now allowing minimum orders of 1000 decks so I've opted to print only 1000 Duel decks. That's great for collectability, but it also means there are only about 100 remaining decks unaccounted for. So, if you're interested in grabbing another deck or two, I'd recommend doing so now by updating your BackerKit account.

Hey everyone,
BackerKit surveys were sent out yesterday. Please check your email and respond to the survey ASAP so we can finalize this process. If you didn't receive an email or can't locate it, go to duel.backerkit.com to retrieve your survey.
In BackerKit, you will be able to:

Hi everyone!
You will soon receive an email with a special link to BackerKit surveys. It is important to respond to your survey as quickly as you can. I need this information in order to properly assemble and ship out your rewards once they are ready. Filling out your BackerKit survey is not required, but it is the easiest way for us to gather essential information about your rewards.

Thank you so much for the final push effort - we were able to barely hit the funding goal and now Duel Playing Cards will be printed and shipped out to all you eager backers :)
It takes about 2 weeks for all the funds to be collected and transferred, after which you will receive a survey and details on how to access BackerKit, which I will be using to organize and manage all of your information.
In BackerKit, you can:

Less than $100 to go and we're funded!
Less than 4 hours left...if everyone adds on one more Vanda deck for $5 we'll easily exceed the goal. Also, please share one more time with your friends.
Thanks everybody!

campaign.story:
Living in Mexico for most of my childhood was a life changing experience. Even though I was born and spent most of my adult life in the United States, so much of who I am is attributed to those years.
I learned so many things about my other nation and got to experience a whole new worldview. The thing that stuck with me most about the mexican people was their love for life. They celebrate daily; they celebrate their history, their culture, their food, their music, their entertainment, their sports, and their traditions. It was such beautiful thing to experience just how much the mexican people loved their country.
It is because of this that I decided to create a lively, unique deck of playing cards that would adequately celebrate and portray my deep love for my mexican heritage.
If you've ever seen a mexican blanket or poncho, then you know what inspired this back design. 
The poncho has been worn in Mexico for hundreds of years. Originally created by the Native Americans of the Andes Mountains, the poncho was not a fashion statement, but a means to keep warm in the harsh winters. Today, these vibrant patterned garments are seen as an iconic symbol for the mexican culture.
Each suit has been recreated to honor mexican cuisine. The corner pips remain standard for easier game play.
The Spades
Mexico is the world's leading producer of avocados. The town Uruapan, Michoacan claims the title of "Avocado Capital of the World".
The Clubs
There are approximately one hundred and fourteen species of nopales known to Mexico, making it so prominent in the country that it is even on the mexican flag.
The Diamonds
Tortilla chips have always been considered to be a Mexican food, more commonly known in Mexico as totopos or tostadas.
The Hearts
The Tomato's use as a food originated in Mexico, and spread throughout the world following the Spanish colonization of the Americas.
The Ace of Spades is modeled after the coat of arms seen in the center of Mexico's flag.
Each of the 12 court cards have been completely redesigned to represent and honor a variety of figures.
The Kings
Zapata, The King of Spades, honors a leading figure in the Mexican Revolution.
El Azteca, The King of Clubs, honors the Aztecs of Mexico.
El Borracho, The King of Hearts, is a tribute to Tequila; Mexico's most famous distilled beverage.
El Campesino, The King of Diamonds, honors a traditional class of mexican farmers.
The Queens
La Santa Muerte, The Queen of Spades, is a female folk saint venerated primarily in Mexico. A personification of death, she is associated with healing, protection, and safe delivery to the afterlife by her devotees
La Virgen de Guadalupe (Our Lady of Guadalupe), The Queen of Clubs, is the recognized symbol of Mexican Catholicism.
La Soldadera, The Queen of Hearts, honors the strong and confident women of Mexico who went into combat alongside men during the Mexican Revolution.
La India, The Queen of Diamonds, represents the indigenous women of Mexico.
The Jacks
El Torero, The Jack of Spades, honors the national sport of Mexico: Bullfighting. Mexico City is home to the biggest bullfighting ring in the world, La Monumental, built in 1942.
El Taquero, The Jack of Clubs. We all love someone who can make delicious tacos.
El Luchador, The Jack of Hearts, is a tribute to Blue Demon, a Mexican Masked professional wrestler who was widely considered to be one of the greatest Mexican wrestlers of his time.
El Mariachi, The Jack of Diamonds, honors Mexico's most famous musicians.
 Viva Mexico comes with two fun and unique Jokers! 
Piñatas are a symbol of the celebratory nature of the mexican people. They unite all ages through joy and laughter. 
The broken piñata includes a 7 of hearts reveal !  
 FRONT
BACK 
SEAL
Printing and fulfillment will be done by
They are able to achieve a level of quality other playing card manufacturers cannot.
As far as fulfillment goes, shipping directly from their warehouse will be much faster and more affordable than doing the fulfillment myself.
Additional rewards will be shipped by the creators or myself. I will do my best to ensure they arrive within the same week.
Note: There may be additional custom fees or taxes for international backers when your package arrives, in which I am not responsible for or have any control over.
Something I really want you to know: I did not include U.S shipping to the tiers unlike other campaigns. Why? Because I want to give ALL BACKERS the best deal. 
One deck is $13 with shipping. 3 decks however, is $33, as oppose to $39 ($13 x 3) if I included U.S shipping to every tier. Also, making others pay for U.S. and International fees is NO BUENO!
Don't forget, the more you pledge, the more you save on shipping! 
Can this project be more exciting and unique? Si señor !

You know that empty wall you've been wanting to hang a beautiful piece of art on? I've got you covered amigo!

Card Clip - $80 // $95 Int'l
Be one of the few to own this unique card clip. Not only does it help your cards last longer, it is also muy bonito!

The card clip is made out of anodized aluminum (by Joe Porper). The playing cards are then wrapped in to the clip. Great quality card clips handmade by Ryan Edwards (REHandcrafted.com)
***This card clip is made with ACTUAL PLAYING CARDS. You will receive this clip SHORTLY AFTER you receive your deck of playing cards.***
Prints - $26 // $36 Int'l

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If I don't hit my goal of $7,500 you will not be charged the money you pledged.

However, once I do reach my goal, production will begin for the playing cards and other rewards immediately.

My team and I will personally be involved in every step along the way. As a card collector, I know it is necessary to have an exceptional product. I am a perfectionist and have done a lot of research as well as contacted the companies producing the rewards to ensure that this project goes smoothly. There may be some unforeseen risks, but I have prepared myself with enough knowledge and research to minimize it. After you have funded this project, just get comfortable; my team and I will do the rest of the work!

If you have questions please post them in the comment section.

Thank you all so much for your generous support!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hola Amigos!

AV designed the original deck for a young man named Jonathan Pieper. Although the concept was brilliant in my opinion, I did notice a few flaws.
Good news is, Jonathan gave Adrian and I total control over the deck. It is ours to do whatever changes we want and launch it on Kickstarter by ourselves in the future.

Hola Amigos
It's been a while since the last update. By now you should all have your decks and other rewards, so this quick update is just to remind you if there is anything you are missing or anything I can do for you please contact me through email: JayLosa@yahoo.com
Last update I teased a project Adrian and I were working on. That project has been put on hold for now. We want to deliver the best products and do not want to rush things.

First and foremost I want to thank al of you for supporting my first successful Kickstarter campaign.
It was a bit more challenging than I expected, and not as smooth as I hoped for, BUT, I learned a lot during the process that will help me have smoother campaigns in the near future.
Shipping - All packages have been shipped and should arrive soon if they still haven't. I had some come back to me for the following reasons : I weighed them incorrectly and needed to pay higher postage, and/or some information was missing in order to be delivered. I corrected all the issues and ALL packages have been shipped. If there are any concerns or issues please e-mail me ( jaylosa@yahoo.com ) and I will look into them.

Hola Amigos!
It was brought to my attention the US Postal Service is charging extra for some of you to receive your decks. 
I AM SO SO SORRY this has happened to some of you. I weighted every item correctly. Apparently my scale doesn't agree with theirs. If this has happened to you please let me know and I will be more than happy to reimburse you for the charges

campaign.story:
Growing up in rural West Texas, I developed a love for the State of Texas. I loved the beauty of the land and friendliness of the people. I came to understand the mystique of Texas, what John Steinbeck famously referred to as something more profound, something exceeding a mere “state of mind.”
Years later, as I first began designing playing cards, I dreamed that some day I’d introduce to the world a very special deck—a deck unlike any other—that would adequately express my deep affection for this place.
That day is finally here.
I’ve made certain that the decks in this series are worthy of their namesake, worthy of the millions of friendly, hardworking, self-determined people that have called it home. I’ve spared no expense for this project. From the highest quality playing cards available, to the most sophisticated printing methods for the packaging, I’ve overlooked no detail in the design and production of this deck.
With this series, I’m especially excited to finally unveil a new engraved intaglio tax stamp, which handsomely functions as a belly band. This is an unprecedented feature among luxury playing cards. Intaglio-engraved tax stamps have not been used for decades due to the difficulty of their production, which in turn leads to unfeasible costs. With this feature I not only get to honor my home state in a unique way, but also get to further challenge the boundaries of design within the playing card world.
You don’t have to be from Texas to appreciate the ideas that inspired these cards. Elegant and classic, they’re inspired by and represent universal concepts: freedom, friendship, hard work, bold living, natural beauty, innovation, and self-determination. In other words, Texas.
Premium Edition - Texas Playing Cards
Available in the following tiers on the right - A2, B2, D1, F1, G1, I1, K1

Cards printed by the United States Playing Card company with an embossed finish.

Click Image for high res
 Kickstarter Exclusive Republic of Texas Passport
This small, softbound booklet — slightly larger than an authentic passport — is a unique 40-page collection of historical documents, photos, and stories on the founding of the Republic of Texas.
The first few pages replicate the functionality of a contemporary passport, but are stylized as being issued by the former Republic of Texas. The pages that follow present a 26-page abridged history of the Republic, authored by distinguished professor and Texas historian A. Ray Stephens. Special Fibermark La Creme paper gives the Passport’s cover the feeling and appearance of extra fine leather.
Every Legacy Edition comes with a complimentary Republic of Texas Passport.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Running a playing card project on Kickstarter is a big task. Luckily I have successfully completed over 12 playing card projects. From the running of the Kickstarter to itself to the fulfillment of rewards we will transparent and straightforward with you as a backer with every aspect of the process. If you have a question we do everything we can to answer it. 

Kings Wild Project has packaged and fulfilled over 15,000 orders in it's almost three year existence. We will hand packing and fulfilling this project ourselves so that as much care and detail can be spent on packing and fulfilling as went into designing the cards themselves.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Kings Wild Backers and Supporters, 
This spring Kings Wild turns 4 years old. We couldn’t have made it this far without your incredible support and encouragement. Because of that, we would like to invite all of you to attend our 4 year Birthday Party. We realize not all of you are local to the Austin area but we wanted to extend an invite regardless. Please reply to our Facebook event here: https://tinyurl.com/zasg2gt 
Want a sneak peak of the venue? 
https://youtu.be/kqxxJcRXOKw

Fulfillment Update
Hello everyone I just wanted to give everyone a quick fulfillment update. We have been working all week packing up orders and getting ready to ship them out. As of now we have just about 80% of all the orders packed up and ready to ship. We will start posting packages tomorrow and try and get as many of them out the door as possible. 
A few other important notes:

Hello everyone. Great news! I received the Gold edition gilded decks this week. I have been a little under the weather this week but hope to start back on the rest of the Texas fulfillment next week. Thank you so much for your patience and support. 
Jackson

Hello everyone! I have some great news! After some bumps in the road we have finally come to the finish line. I'm happy to say that the Texas deck is almost finally finished. The gilding process is almost over and is scheduled to be finished on the 1st of June. With that news and with all of the hickups behind us, I'm happy to announce that starting on Monday of next week we will start fulfilling orders. I will be taking the remaining week to organize and prepare all of the rewards. I will begin with all of the orders that DO NOT include the Gold Edition (The Gilded version) and hopefully by the time I am finished with those orders I will have received the Gilded decks and be able to complete the fulfillment.

Hello everyone. I just wanted to post a quick production update. Here is the current status of the project.
I have received all of the reprinted Aces that were originally errored.
I have received all of the hand made Pecan and Padauk Legacy Cases and they look awesome.
I have received all of the intaglio printed numbered seals for the Gold and Legacy decks.
I have received all gold dealer coins

Hello everyone. I just wanted to give everyone a quick update on projection. USPCC and I have figured out a solid plan for correcting, gilding and finishing the Texas decks. The corrected reprint art has been approved and is on the printing and finishing schedule and we have established a solid outsourced vendor for gilding the the Gold editions. Realistically at this point we are 6 -10 weeks out from having everything corrected and wrapped up, but that estimate is still very much an estimate. The good news is that we have a plan in motion and everything is moving forward.

I first off want to express my deepest appreciation for all you. With out the help and support of all the backers this and all of my projects would not have been made possible. I wanted to give you guys a quick update on both the status of production and also some very sad news that effects me personally and in turn, Kings Wild.
If you have been trying to contact me over the past few weeks and have been frustrated with my response time it is for a very simple reason. My youngest daughter Hannah passed away two weeks ago and I have been focusing all of my attention and efforts on taking care of my very special family.

updates.update_userinfo: I forgot to add this news in my last update. I got to busy trying to explain production details
updates.update_content:
I first off want to express my deepest appreciation for all you. With out the help and support of all the backers this and all of my projects would not have been made possible. I wanted to give you guys a quick update on both the status of production and also some very sad news that effects me personally and in turn, Kings Wild.
One of the things I love most about Kickstarter is that you the backer get to be a part and also to see into the lives of the creators you support. That aspect, I believe, makes the part you play as a backer so much more meaningful than just purchasing something of a website. I am not a huge company with numerous employees, Kings Wild is a very small operation and we have done, and will continue to do our very best to take care of all issues you may have.

I must say that I find it surprising when anyone in the USA complains about the deck price or if a shipping cost appears. Yes, decks have increased a bit - but the international shipping has risen by well over 150% in recent years. It is actually the USPS costs that are prohibitively expensive - i.e. a single deck at $13 has a $10 shipping cost = $23 for a single deck. So in my eyes Double_Left is getting a great deal by comparison.

My suggestion is grab the premium edition and maybe grab some of the Player's edition. It features the same cards, but with a different tuck case. The best way for it is that it's a more "usable" version so you can pick up a few more of them without hurting the wallet. I know some will prefer the premium version, but there is another one available as well.
Take care, Thanks.
One last correction, this deck, the Texas deck, is printed by USPCC. It's always been honest and stated from the beginning.

campaign.story:
It takes days, months even years for dreams to realize. It took us almost 6 years to realize ours. Caught up servicing artworks for others, we never got a chance to look into our own dream.

This deck of cards is our dreams, on air cushion paper.

We are excited to present to you our Brand NEW.....
Classic Bicycle® Playing Cards

Hauled from past, "The Classic Playing Cards" are aged to elegance. Wrapped in the vintage design, these cards are for card collectors and card workers who crave all. 
Curated & produce by 9780 design company and printed by USPCC on air cushion finish these cards are aged to true vintage style.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As far as designing custom playing cards are concerned, we have done it half a dozen time so no issues there.

However we are new to the whole production game but we have done our detailed research and our strategy and plans are in place.

Our designs are already been approved by the Legal Team of USPCC and so once we get successfully funded all that would remain is to print, pack, ship and........CHEERS!

Our next challenge would be "distribution". So we will be shipping everything from US and to make sure, we already have our crew members stationed in USA to overlook the shipping of your packages personally. We will keep you updated on every prominent steps of our journey from printing, packaging to shipping.

We are keeping a close eye on every aspect related to this project because we are desperate to bring "Classic" in our time.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Celebrate History With Us!
This year the Magna Carta turned 800 years old. Initially ambiguous in its future, this document has transformed over time into an icon that has rippled throughout world history with positive change. To me, the Magna Carta is one of the most inspiring examples of timelessness. Today the Magna Carta is the foundation of liberty and human rights in many parts of the world. This deck series was created to honor and celebrate this landmark occasion.  
This series is split up into two factions. Royals vs. Rebels. The Royals deck commands attention in rich black, representing the King and his empire. The sleek back design features the gorgeous crowned lion in which 3 heads represent the 3 lion crest of the Angevin Empire. 
The Rebels deck is featured in white, displaying intricate linework and a composition showing multiple "regions" to symbolize all the different barons uniting against the King. The ribbon displays the famous phrase, Legem Terrae meaning "Law of the Land". Together the ribbon from the Rebels deck and the ribbon from the royals deck unite to create a perfect circle representing a temporary moment of unity between the two sides referencing the circular shape of the King's seal. 
The court cards were carefully selected based on actual people involved around the Magna Carta. The suits were used to help show the family factions within this time period. All of these cards were inspired by existing illustrations of the people we could find from that time and translated into the elegant designs you see here. 
Each suit carries symbolism based on the court cards that they hold. The Spade features a cross in the center representing the cross on King John's coat. The Club hides a lion face representing the Angevin Empire. 
A sword skewers the Heart, adorning the fleur de lis for Louis VIII. Finally the Diamond proudly displays the crest symbol of Robert Fitzwalter, the leader of the baronial opposition. 
The Jokers feature an authentic recreation of the face and back of King John's seal. 
These tuck cases feature a realm of modern elegance that compliments the older illustrations in a beautiful juxtaposition. The designer packaging features a peek of each suit in front and back of the case. In keeping with my passion of interactive packaging, these decks pair perfectly together to help create any suit you choose. 
 Royals and Rebels Deck Features
Tuck cases are foiled with eye-catching gold and embossed on premium stock to provide a sense of depth to the touch.
Inner tuck case is lined with an exact replica of the actual 1215 Magna Carta document in archive from The British Library.
Cards are made with Aristocrat stock and coated with premium magic finish for increased longevity and performance.
Card designs feature gorgeous metallic gold accents throughout that help unite the cards to their cases and to each other.
Printed with the United States Playing Card Company
Embossing pattern was based off of Knight's pleats.
For collectors I've crafted a special King John deck representing the origin of the Magna Carta. This deck is crucial in helping tell the story of the abuse in taxation which spurred the eventual rebellion. The deck represents the motivations of the Magna Carta, featuring King John tuck case but with the Rebel Baron's gold in hand representing the taxation crisis.
 Limited Edition GOLD King John Deck Features
Only 500 printed
Features a completely new tuck case adorning the majestic Ace of Spades of King John with the gold of the Rebels
Gilded shimmering gold edges by USPCC to help maintain final deck sealed in mint condition.
Tuck case is foiled with eye-catching gold and embossed on premium stock to provide a sense of depth to the touch. 
Cards are made with Aristocrat stock and coated with premium magic finish for increased longevity and performance. 
Card designs feature gorgeous metallic gold accents throughout that help unite the cards to their cases and to each other. 
Printed with the United States Playing Card Company
KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE: Limited Edition SILVER Gilded King John Deck
By incredible demand we've launched the silver gilded King John deck to allow those wishing to complete the mural to do so. They feature all the same premium quality stocks and finishes as the Gold edition except with the modification of having silver gilded edging. These decks are only available through Kickstarter to reward our early supporters. We will not be selling these after at our store meaning this complete mural will surely become a true collector's display.

These decks feature gorgeous mirror-like gilding across the sides of the deck that compliment the linework of the Rebels deck. Gold and Silver King John decks will be differentiated by individually numbered tax stamps to truly emphasize the authenticity of these decks. 

A strict 2-deck limit is in place for these decks. They are only available as an add-on or through tiers KJS and KJS2. Gilded decks are not available through S1 tier.
As a way to pay tribute to this event, you can now recreate it with the world's first hexapytch deck series. Often times the sides of a tuck case are wasted away with filler text, being an underutilized area for artwork. Inspired by old book collections which featured beautiful murals across their spines, I've illustrated this famous event based on the iconic image of the signing. 
Each deck reveals a slice of this moment in history with illustrations of different members related to the Magna Carta. A different faction is featured on either end so that you literally get to choose sides.
The visual system was designed to work with every tier combination to create a cohesive image. So whether you pick the full Master Mural brick or couple decks you'll be sure to have a real piece of history to display proudly.
Magna Carta Attire
These shirts feature the Royals Ace of Spade and the Rebels Ace of Hearts. Each shirt is crafted in the USA using soft comfortable fabric that feels like you've owned it for years! Shirts are screen printed on genuine American Apparel 50/50 blend. All sizes available and will be taken at the end of the campaign. 

White press on Heather Black. (Click to enlarge)
Black press on New Silver. All shirts for $22. (+$7 int)
Uncut Sheets
Uncut sheets have always held a special place in my heart as a collector. I'm honored to be offering these gorgeous uncut sheets directly from the factory. Each sheet is individually numbered and signed by the artist printed once and never again.
2" King John's Seal Coin
During the time there was nothing more powerful than the King's seal. Instead of signatures King's would implement a double-sided seal to create a coin pendent that would signify the ruling power's approval. This 2" seal is authentically replicated with an antique gold finish so that you can now hold the power of the King as well.
 How to Add On Items:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Many of the risks and challenges stem from production and shipping. This is my second Kickstarter and fourth time printing with our partner factory. I've properly calculated and compensated for these two things to ensure that my backers will get their project within a timely manner.

The producers of these cards will be with The US Playing Card Company and the shipping services will be with USPS. I have produced decks and fulfilled large scale orders with both these partners before. Thanks to our previous history with these companies with 2 other runs, any unexpected hiccups that occur should remain minimal. Production takes around 6-8 weeks permitted that there are no intervening holidays. Upon receipt of the product for our last KS we were able to fulfill all orders within 10 days.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
We're Shipped!
The final decks arrived Monday and all remaining orders are out to the fulfillment house today. WooHoo! This project has been an incredible whirlwind of ups, downs, and everything in between. I'm so honored to have taken this journey with you guys into making these cards happen. Display your murals with pride and actually open them! There's art inside to be enjoyed!
For those wanting to add more to their collection you can always visit the Seasons Site and sign up for the newsletter or follow me on Instagram and Facebook.

As you guys know I try to keep my updates of value so that I'm not spamming. Finally have a bit more of an update for gilding.
Gilding Status
I've been informed by USPCC that the gilding party is taking longer than expected. Hand Craftsmanship = Time as we know. The revised ETA is end of April. That being said, there is some nicer news. Working with USPCC we might be able to start arrangements to have those that were completed shipped for finishing to be packed and sealed so that I can ship what is available end of next week most likely.  I can't promise anything but fingers crossed.

GORGEOUS
...is what you'll say when you see these proofs. Good update today. After talking with USPCC they'll be able to ship separately so that we'll be able to get the bulk orders out while they're still navigating the gilded deck issue. The boxes will arrive at USPCC Friday where they'll load the decks, so we're expected to receive them within a few days of that.

Hey guys,
Just to keep you guys updated, the cards were shot off the press this week as planned and the re-order of display boxes are still on schedule. However there was one caveat that some of you may have heard from other project owners as well in regards to gilding. USPCC is no longer able to produce gilded decks in house because of their machinery. They are still ensuring that the cards will get gilded with the highest quality but are currently looking for a new gilding partner. That being said I am currently in conversation with them to hopefully maintain the rest of the shipments in check so that I can get the bulk orders out until they sort out the gilded deck situation. When I receive further information from them I'll be sure to update you guys.

Hi guys!
I hope you've all been having a great holiday weekend. I'm sure some of you are still in the midst of festivities still so this update will be quick, but I wanted to make one since there is so much to share. Coins are in, t-shirts are in, foil proofs are in, and display boxes are scheduled to arrive Monday.

campaign.story:
Beetle Royale is a set of 2 decks of unique playing cards, a Light Deck and a Dark Deck. 
Highlights
54 Individually hand-painted cards
Unique running beetle animation when shuffling
poker size playing cards (63mm x 88mm, 2.5" x 3.5") 
Printed by the Legends Playing Card Company (LPCC)
Diamond Finish stock for greatest durability, longevity and handling
2 Deck Variants
Silver and Orange foil accents on the Tuck boxes!
Interior tuck box print
Make sure you read through all the reward tiers! ------------------------->>
Card Back
Both decks have the same back. This makes it easy to put both Light and Dark decks into a single game, while the front artwork still allows the decks to be split back out easily. The artwork on the back features an animation effect unlike any other deck in your collection. 
This animation is done without marking the backs. Every card back is the same with a single orientation. The animation can easily be achieved by simple splitting the deck, rotating one pile and shuffling:
each corner beetle is flipped, so rotating half the cards in a shuffle will create the animation
PLAY

The deck shown in the video was created by MPC (not LPCC). Final deck will be slightly different--but in a good way :)
The Cards - Light Deck
A sample hand: Light Deck
The Cards - Dark Deck
A sample spread: Dark Deck
 Tuck Boxes
I don't have proofs yet that include the silver and orange metallic foil for these designs, but here's the basic design concept:
Tuck Box Foil Accents
I really like the gold-like orange foil that Legends used on their Day of the Dead deck, so I'm choosing that color for the Light Deck. The Dark deck will have a silver foil accent. These are the accent parts, so imagine these parts of the artwork on the tuck boxes in the silver and metallic orange.
Interior Box Printing
Both decks will get this interior print:
Jokers
Dark Variant
Light Deck Variant
Hearts - Light Version
Hearts: Light Version
Hearts - Dark Version
Spades - Light Version
Spades: Light Version
Spades - Dark Version
Clubs - Light Version
Clubs: Light Version
Clubs - Dark Version
Diamonds - Light Version
Diamonds: Light Version
Diamonds - Dark Version
Production
This deck of playing cards will be printed by the Legends Playing Card Company, run by the talented Lawrence Sullivan. After researching countless suppliers, it became clear that LPCC is the right choice. LPCC produces the highest class of playing cards due to their attention to detail with exceptional durability, ultra-precise printing registration, and the ‘glass like’ edges of their signature ‘Diamond Cut’ process. I am sparing no expense to make this an exciting deck for both players and collectors.
Above: Two new decks, Bicycle (left), Legends (right). Above: Two new decks, Bicycle (left), Legends (right).
Learn more about LPCC's commitment to playing cards and their quality on the LPCC Site.
Please note that the cover image and all other photos of real cards shown in the video and on this page are not done by LPCC. I made a bunch of prototypes using MakePlayingCards.com, which I highly recommend for ordering single decks (and they produce some great cards too)--but the final decks will be a bit different than what you see in the samples on this page.
Add-Ons!
Backers in the USA can add $10 to any reward tier to get:
► 8 Die Cut Stickers (one of each design)
► 3 Beetle Greeting Cards (one of each design)
Note: The $44 tier will also get 8 stickers instead of 3, but I can't change the wording on the rewards after launch.
photo by Lena Eivy (lenaeivy.com)
Die Cut Stickers!
I've got die cut stickers available from StickerMule! Since I'm ordering these in bulk, I can include them inexpensively for backers in the US. Outside the US, you'll have to order from StickerMule, but their rates are great and all profits will go toward this project funding!
Hand Drawn Stickers!
There's a limited reward tier ($44) that will allow you to get one of these hand-drawn, ink sticker sheets. You'll also get 4 decks, 3 die cut stickers and a greeting card so get that while you can! 
The sticker sheet will be randomly chosen from my stack:
Coloring Book
I'm having a coloring book made by Lulu: http://www.lulu.com/spotlight/adameivy
I'm still trying to figure out if I can order these in bulk. Add-on status TBD--but you can order them right now from lulu for $8/each and all profits I collect from those sales will go toward this project funding!
Use this code on Lulu to get free shipping (until August 24th): FGA815
The Coloring Book
PLAY

I have submitted a new version of the coloring book to make the art more distant from the center fold of the paper. That version is up on the lulu store.
Greeting Cards
I'll also be including Greeting Cards, printed locally in Seattle by TCC Printing.
The Making Of
It was a long time in the making and I learned a ton. I created a lot of print concepts along the way.
More information on the process can be found on the Procreate forums: http://procreate.si/forums/index.php?topic=6930.0
Stretch Goals - TBD
TBD. I decided that the decks absolutely must have the interior print and foil finish regardless of how much we overfund. Extra goals could include more stickers, more greeting cards, postcards, who knows!
Social Following
Help spread the word by following and sharing this project:
Instagram: @atomantic
Facebook: @Beetle Royale
Special Thanks
The video was produced by RoqFilms (Quoc is awesome)
The background music in the video came from the talented Josh Woodward:  http://www.joshwoodward.com/
Thanks to all the members of the Seattle Sketch Pistols Drink and Draw who gave me feedback and watched this thing progress.
And I couldn't have done this project over the last 18 months without my supportive and talented wife, Lena Eivy, who did the cover photo, pictures of me in my process as well as various product shots, and my loving daughter Ilya who inspired me to draw again. I <3 you two.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Just as I have spent the last 18 months designing this deck and ordering proofs to validate assumptions, I've also spent many months researching Kickstarter, shipping/fulfillment and ensuring that I have everything lined up before starting this campaign.

There are always risks involved in a project, but I am confident this one will be out by the holiday season of 2015.

I am using the highly reputable Legends Playing Card Company both for printing and fulfillment. All decks will be shipped by Legends Playing Card Company. They are already sitting on the finished artwork and ready to print and fulfill the orders when the project completes.

Because I am using the highest quality printing materials offered, it will take LPCC 3 months to complete the production.

Of course delays can happen. It's possible that quality control will call for a reprint of the order or parts of the order. Shipment will be coming from the Legends Playing Card Company fulfillment center in Hong Kong, so delays could form there. I will be doing whatever I can to ensure these orders are fulfilled accurately, timely and with the highest care for the quality of the product.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Opening the Box, Animation Effect, Shipping
updates.update_content:
Happy new year! Wow, that month went by fast.
Opening the Decks
I noticed a few people in person struggling to find the way to remove the cellophane wrap on the card decks, so I want to drop a note that if you look at the top right of the front of the box (right above the end of the word Royale), you will find a little red tab that you can pull away from the front.

Hi all,
As we get closer to Christmas, some people are still wondering where their packages are. I'm continuing to get daily confirmations of receipt from backers (thanks to all who have sent me messages!), so my guess is that the mail systems got backed up with holiday packages, which is making the packages take a bit longer for some.
The fulfillment center has tracking numbers for all of the orders, but they have not sent these to me yet. Ten hours ago, Legends replied with this:

Hi all,
I just got back from vacation and Legends Playing Card Co. has informed me that as of Friday, Dec. 11th, all orders have been fulfilled.
I've also started hearing from people around the world who have started receiving their decks (and I'm guessing many more have gotten them and haven't said anything).

The playing cards made it to the shipping/fulfillment center on November 18th (2 days ago). They fulfill about 50 packages a day, so they should have all the playing cards en route by November 24th!
Please post photos of your cards when you get them. I still haven't seen the final decks in full yet and you will likely get your packages before I get the remainder so I would love to see what you get! Also I want to make sure you got your packages, so that will help me know they are arriving safely :)

Hi all,
I'll be sending your shipping information to the fulfillment center tomorrow evening, so if you have any last updates to your mailing address, please update it by tomorrow (Tuesday, Nov 10th) at 6pm PST. I'll be locking the surveys then.
If you have any issues after that, please reach out to me via direct message.

Hi everyone,
I have an estimate on when the production run should be complete for the decks of cards: November 17th!
This means I need to get the final address edits by Nov 10th (as I need to compile the shipping list for the distribution center and prep them before they get the cards). So I will be locking the surveys so they won't be able to be edited further on the 10th!
Dates of Interest
PLAY

campaign.story:
Hi, hello and howdy. Thanks!!! for checking out my campaign for a custom, hand-illustrated deck of playing cards. This unique poker-sized deck depicts scenes and characters from the legendary Trojan War.
I am Chris Staples. duxoop is where I make stuff. This is The Fall of Troy...
Why Back The Fall of Troy?
Because you love high quality.
Because you love creativity.
Because you love poker.
Because you love the people who love the above.
I have been a professional designer for nearly twenty years (yikes) and have had experience with many kinds of print jobs, including playing cards. I plan to have the deck printed at MPC in order to utilize some of the exciting new techniques and technologies that they are playing with. In short, if you like what you see in this campaign, you will love the finished product.
Ajax ][ King of Hearts
While adhering to time honored conventions of playing card design, the Fall of Troy presents a unique style within the class of custom decks.
Helen of Troy ][ Queen of Hearts
Why Playing Cards?
Playing cards are a great medium for sharing and enjoying art. As their name indicates, they are for playing. They are made and meant to be touched and handled, a counterpoint to their museum-hung cousins or book-bound brethren. Playing cards bring us together as groups and entertain us in solitaire. One deck is a box of canvasses, each canvas tells a story - rich with characters and drama. So much from something that fits in your pocket.
Ajax Carries Slain Achilles ][ Ace of Spades
Why the Trojan War?
The legendary Fall of Troy story has entertained audiences for thousands of years. For centuries the tale was passed down verbally until Homer committed part of it to the written word. The Iliad focuses on brilliant Achilles, and his supreme rage in the last year of the Trojan War. Homer's epic poem is the first of countless histories, dramatizations, songs, books, films, paintings, etc, to be inspired by the Acheans' ten year assault on Ilios. Works such as, Aeschylus' trilogy, the Oresteia and William Shakespeare's play Troilus and Cressida have recycled the themes and ideas of the Trojan War throughout antiquity. The homage continues even in this modern age with songs like "Achilles Last Stand" by Led Zeppelin and films like Troy, directed by Wolfgang Petersen and starring Brad Pitt as Achilles and Eric Bana as Hector.
Packed with all of the action (and more) of today's Hollywood blockbusters and personified by characters with strengths and frailties that ring so true even now, it comes as no surprise that the story of the Trojan War persists and continues to excite readers, watchers and listeners of all kinds. Playing cards are a perfect platform to portray this ancient, yet timely drama and more importantly another way to introduce this vivid piece of human history to the people of today... and stuff.
Ares the God of War ][ Jack of Spades
The Design
Much of the fun and challenge in creating The Fall of Troy deck has been striking the balance between ancient styles and modern layout, as well as, finding methods common to both eras, such as the conventional use of symmetry in playing card design.
These cards have been designed to stand out comfortably among any decks of playing cards on the table. The Fall of Troy compliments our favorite standard decks, such as the classic Bicycle deck, while at the same time pairs well with the new high end custom art decks that continue to emerge, thanks to communities like Kickstarter. (Two stunning Kickstarter examples of this burgeoning form are the Leonardo and BRuT decks by Dent-de-Lion du Midi and Uusi respectively.
As seen on...
Thank You!
Thanks again for taking the time to check out The Fall of Troy. Please send this link to anyone who may have an interest in Art, Mythology, History, Warfare, Poker, Custom Playing Cards or just playing card games with family and friends.
I look forward to sending you your reward!
see more at www.duxoop.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my first Kickstarter campaign. With appreciation for the complexity of any production, I'm keeping this one simple. As such, I am qualified to perform or oversee every step and will be aware of all aspects of production. Should any unforeseen obstacles or challenges arise, my backers will be the first to know.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hi Backers,
I am happy to announce that I will begin shipping decks again this Wednesday, October 26th. Please send me any updated shipping info via Kickstarter messages. Otherwise, your next contact will be a shipping confirmation email with tracking info.

Best,

updates.update_userinfo: The Fall of Troy ][ Shipping Update I
updates.update_content:
Dear Fall of Troy Backers,
I spent the weekend organizing the orders and have begun to ship!

updates.update_userinfo: The Fall of Troy ][ Production Update IX
updates.update_content: The decks have arrived!

updates.update_userinfo: The Fall of Troy ][ Production Update VIII
updates.update_content:
Dear Fall of Troy backers,
The test prints for the outer tuck box have arrived! Take a look...

updates.update_userinfo: The Fall of Troy ][ Production Update VII
updates.update_content:
Dear Fall of Troy Backers,
The painful comedy continues...
My suspicions that the printer was having me over-simplify the tuck box design were confirmed when, in spite of the fact that I mention "high gloss' in nearly all of my correspondence and the details of the job (including "high gloss") are listed at the top of every support ticket, the printer confirmed that she was having me set up for GOLD FOIL printing of the tuck box and not HIGH GLOSS. Ugh. This means that the artwork that was delivered to the printer in December was good to go and I've spent countless hours revising the artwork for no good reason. The cherry on top of this sundae of despair was the simultaneous announcement that the printer would be closing for two weeks for Chinese New Year. Yay!

updates.update_userinfo: The Fall of Troy ][ Production Update VI
updates.update_content:
Hi Fall of Troy Backers,
I hope that this update finds you enjoying the holiday season!
I had expected this update to announce the arrival of the printed decks, however that is not the case. I'm still working with the printer on the technical details mainly related to the high gloss printing on the tuck box. On one hand, I'm frustrated by the delay, on the other, I've been happy with the quality of the prototypes and feel confident that, when the decks arrive, they will be very nice.

updates.update_userinfo: The Fall of Troy ][ Production Update V
updates.update_content:
Hey Fall of Troy Backers!
In the midst of designing the Fall of Troy ][ Suit of Diamonds, I became powerfully distracted by the artwork for the Tuck Box. I followed the inspiration and am now excited to share the art for both the Suit of Diamonds and the Tuck Box.

updates.update_userinfo: The Fall of Troy ][ Production Update IV
updates.update_content:
Dear Fall of Troy Backers!
Nearly all of the surveys are in and I'll be locking down orders tomorrow - 11/05/15.
Closing in on final design for all suits!
We're in the final stretch. Moving into marathon mode. Diamonds coming soon. Now check out the Clubs...

updates.update_userinfo: The Fall of Troy ][ Production Update III
updates.update_content:
Hey FoT Backers!
75% of the surveys have been completed. Thank you! Of course, this means that I still need shipping info from a lot of people.
If you don't remember getting the original survey or can't find it, I'm sending a reminder email out along with this update with the survey link. If you don't see it in your inbox, please check your junk mailbox.

, you can update or revise any of your info until the orders are locked on 10/05/15. That means if you come up with an even greater name for your Proof of Authenticity Card, you can make the change! On that note, I wasn't expecting so many backers to go with themed names for their cards, but I love it! I've been cracking up going through the submissions.

 the Backerkit survey is set up to calculate single deck shipping only, so if you order more than one deck, it's multiplying the single deck shipping rate, instead of doing a more appropriate calculation. If you are interested in ordering more decks, but were turned off by the hefty shipping prices, please message me directly to work out a more realistic rate. I've done this with a few backers already and have worked out the process. You can update your order until the orders are locked on 10/05/15.

updates.update_userinfo: The Fall of Troy ][ Production Update II
updates.update_content:
Hey FoT Backers,
Just in case you were wondering, I have not sent out the surveys yet. They have been set up (one for each pledge level) and are queued to be checked and approved by Backerkit and will go out soon. Working with Backerkit has been educational and at this stage, waiting to learn more about BackerKit's service will have no impact on our delivery schedule, therefore I'm taking the opportunity to do it right. Woohoo!

Our team at Gambler’s has years of experience in order fulfillment, e-commerce and customer service. We also have a strong relationship with the Expert Playing Card Company and have spent countless hours backing, reviewing and supporting other playing cards and Kickstarter projects. updates.update_userinfo: Bicycle Spirit II Playing Cards Project Launched on Kickstarter !!
updates.update_content:
Hello,  
Just wanted to let you guys know that we released a sequel to the original Bicycle Spirit Decks printed last year. Here are a few clicks for your reference:

Hello,
First of all i would like to thank all backers who did like alloy decks & its associated add-ons. Hopefully 90 percent of the backers have received their rewards by now. Let us know if anyone has not yet received their tracking or their reward. Please send a PM and we will look into the status of each order.
Secondly we have released a new project "Liberty Back Playing Cards". The decks have been designed by the one of the most renowned artists of the contemporary playing cards scenario "".

Hello Backer,
The wait is almost over as we finally received the pallets from Expert Playing Cards.
We have already passed on the decks for gilding to production department and will be ready within 1 week. In the meantime we will be sorting out all the files and begin fulfillment of basic orders from coming Wednesday or Thursday. Send us a pm if you have any query or want to change shipping address as all the surveys have been locked.

Hello,  
First of all we would like to apologize for the delay in sending out an update. The reason behind is that most of our office staff was on vacations after the hectic busy Christmas sales season. Also we were waiting on the sample decks to arrive so we can show them to you. Here are a few ordinary clicks just to give you guys an idea:

Hello,
Unlocking tomorrow at 12 pm CST Alloy Cobalt Gilded Edition on http://www.playingcards.net !! Limited to 50 only. Only 40 will be available for sale. Limit 1 per order. No discount codes to applied on this sale !! Shipping February 2016.

campaign.story:
SNAK 2.0 AFHÆNGER AF DIN STØTTE
VELKOMMEN TIL SNAK'S CROWDFUNDING.
INDHOLD
- Hvad og Hvorfor er SNAK?
- Bevar SNAK
- Udvikling af SNAK
- SNAK til arbejdet, familen, venner, par mm. 
- Hvad går pengene til // Stretch Goals
- Incitamenter uddybbet
- SNAK fortællinger
HVAD ER SNAK?SNAK er et kortspil, som siden 2012 har sat gang i samtaler og styrket relationer over hele landet. Som videoen indikerer, er det et meget simpelt spil. Det er velovervejet, at spillet er simpelt, for at det er gennem gendkendeligheden, at der opstår et rum, hvor man føler sig tryg. Det gør, at SNAKs intention om at rammesætte samtalen ikke bliver forceret. Mange har delt med os, hvor overraskede de blev over, hvor meget de fik lyst til at dele med deres medspillere.
Tre år efter SNAK-spillets lancering er vi en hel masse erfaringer og gode historier rigere, og derfor vil vi relancere spillet med de ændringer, vi er kommet frem til. 
HVORFOR?
En god snak er vigtig, men det kan være svært at få skabt plads til den. Det er netop det, SNAK kan hjælpe med. For det er gennem den gode samtale, at vi ser og hører hinanden. Vi udvider vores egen og andres forståelse. I sidste ende er det netop vores relationer, som danner mening i livet og giver styrke til dagen og vejen, og derfor er det så vigtigt at have gode snakke.
BEVAR SNAK
Grunden til at denne crowdfunding kører er, at der ikke er flere spil tilbage, og der er ikke skabt nok kapital gennem de første tre år til at kunne fortsætte. Derfor har vi brug for din hjælp!
UDVIKLING AF SNAK SNAK har gennem tre år skabt store oplevelser for mange, men en udfording ved SNAK-spillet er, at det kan være svært at bringe på banen. Derfor har vi gentænkt muligheden for at gøre spilles mere let og sjovt. Den dybe samtale er stadig er en mulighed, men det skal også være muligt, at det er sjovt at spille SNAK.    

SNAK PÅ ARBEJDET, MED FAMILEN ELLER SOM PAR
Med det nye SNAK-spil vil vi imødekomme muligheden for at bruge det i relationer, som ikke kender hinanden så godt i forvejen. Derfor håber vi at se spillet blive brugt på bl.a. arbejdspladser, hvor behovet for at lære hinanden bedre at kende ofte kan være svær at sætte fokus på. Med SNAK 2.0 bliver det forhåbentlig mere naturligt.
HVAD GÅR PENGENE TIL?
Pengene går til at kunne sætte produktionen af SNAK 2.0 i gang. Der skal produceres 5000 nye spil, og det er de 25.000 kr. vi har søgt om i vores crowdfunding faktisk ikke nok til, men de er nok til, at vi tør kaste os ud i at gøre det.
STRETCH GOALS
40.000 kr. – Hvis vores crowdfunding ender på 40.000 kr., må I bestemme noget sindssygt, der skal ske. Vi laver en afstemning på vores Facebookside, hvor I får lov til at bestemme, om det er bungee jump eller noget andet, I vil kaste SNAK-chef Frederik ud i.
60.000 kr. – Alle udgifter i forhold til produktion vil blive dækket. Drømmen om, at SNAK bliver mere end en fritidsbeskæftigelse vil blive opnået. Og så holder vi en fest i både Aarhus og København, hvor alle jer, der ha
INCITAMENTER UDDYBBET 
Her er der billeder af nogle af tingene fra pakkerne.
Længere oppe kan i spillet, som det kommer til at se (det kan være vi ændre det lidt)
Vedr. foredrag: På SNAK-chef Frederiks hjemmeside (FrederikSvinth.com) kan du læse om, hvilke konkrete emner han holder foredrag om. Det er også en mulighed at dreje det i en bestemt vinkel alt efter, hvad der passer jer. Her er en lille smagsprøve på Frederik, der fortæller.
UDTALELSE
Autenticitet, begavet varme og nærvær
Frederik Svinth har en historie som ingen kan misunde ham, og dog har han en gave i den historie som er værdifuld og relevant for os andre. Frederiks tab blev til en øjenåbner for ham, og det er en påmindelse for os andre om at vælge til og fra, om at være nærværende i alt vi gør. Frederik har en nerve og en energi i ham som smitter publikum og de mennesker han står overfor. Jeg er en fan hele vejen, og hver gang vi har lejlighed til at arbejde sammen, får jeg bekræftet at Frederik er begavet og varm, autentisk og en god ven. Hans Ravnkjær Larsen, CEO - Cheche.dk
SNAK FortællingerGang på gang har folk delt, hvad SNAK har gjort for dem. Her er der et par videoer, hvor man kan høre nogle af fortællingerne.
READ ENGLISH VERSION HERE
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
En af udfordringer for SNAK, er at spillet endnu ikke kan køres som et fuldtidsprojekt. Frederik, som er motoren i projektet, er far til to, og dermed følger et ansvar for at holde en stabil hverdag kørende. En hverdag, hvor han ved siden af også skal tjene til dagen og vejen. Derfor har SNAK langt fra det tempo, som vi drømmer om.

SNAK er en virksomhed, som laver et humant projekt. Ofte ligger det i et grænseland mellem et humanitært projekt og real business. Det er en udfordring, vi nyder, for det skaber mening at gøre det på den måde. MEN - det er også svært at køre ægte forretning med så bløde værdier, og det kan være svært som virksomhed at få fondsmidler, hvilket ville lette byrden meget i SNAK.

Derfor er den største udfordring at få økonomien til at hænge sammen, så det kan få den luft under vingerne som vi drømmer om. Netop derfor laver vi denne crowdfunding-kampagne.

En sidste udfordring er, at det er drønsvært at komme igennem til de store kædebutikkker, som vi håber vil sælge SNAK-spillene. Med SNAK 2.0 håber vi, at de vil få øjenene op for vores spil.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Spillet er her nu! Jeg glæder mig til at få det sendt ud til alle jer der støttede det!
I kan se en video fra idag her https://vimeo.com/147519392
Spillene er kommet ned i kælderen og de første 11 butikker i Århus har fået deres spil.
Jeg regner med at få sendt jeres spil ud den her uge!

Hej.
Crowdfundingen lukkede ned d. 13 okt, altså for 2 uger siden, og siden har vi knoklet for at få spillet færdigt og sat i trykken. 
Alt er nu pakket og sendt afsted, så nu kan vi bare vente i spændning.
Jeg har smidt et lille billede med, hvor i kan se det endelige design, hele tanken med det nye design er at det skal fortælle mere om SNAK og være mindre prætentiøst end det sidste spil, og det synes jeg virkelig at Tim (grafiker) har fået gjort.

updates.update_userinfo: Vi har nået målet! men vi skal længere, (heeeelt ind i sindet..)
updates.update_content:
Halløj!
Så er vi nået i mål, hvert fald det første mål!
Kickstarteren er i hus, og nu skal jeg da igang med at få lavet det SNAK 2.0 spil!
Det gør vi med jeres hjælpe!

Vi kan virkelig godt bruge at den kommer længere op, så del stadigvæk meget gerne kampagnen, SNAK er et hobby projekt jeg kører ved siden af fuldtids arbejde, så al hjælp tages imod med kyshånd.

updates.update_userinfo: Solen skinder og vi 75% i mål!
updates.update_content:
Der er mere end to uger til kampagnen lukkes og vi allerede langt, det er virkelig fedt. 
Det været helt vildt sjovt at følge med i hvordan vores "Mande-Video" er blevet taget imod, hør mere og mærk begejstringen i videoen herunder:
Ventilen drog sommeren 2014 ud sammen med FuckingFlink og SNAK for at snakke om venskab, siden har Ventilen også brugt spillet på deres mødessteder for unge, her er en fortælling om det:

Seneste skud på stammen af videoer for SNAKs kampagne er nu skudt afsted.
En video med lidt budskab til mændende, men også med eksplosioner, babes og alt det der!

Del den meget gerne!

Hej folkens!
Dejligt at mærke opbakningen fra alle jer der støtter op og deler!

Jeg har lavet en masse videoer, bla. nogen med fortællinger fra tiden med SNAK, ind til videre er der 8, som alle giver et indblik hvad SNAK kan bringe med sig.

Her kan i se Alle videoerne, de vil også komme op på Facebooksiden løbende.

Her er 2. update fra video bloggen :) 
En tør kommentar om at gøre noget som SNAK sjovt...
Her en lille update om at komme igang igen, Kampagnen er opstartet, men som sådan ikke fuldt lanceret endnu, det vil den blive d. 10 Sept.

campaign.story:
Since the beginning of time, man has sought protection through the creation of weapons. Weapons molded and changed the course of history, destroying civilizations and creating new ones. As enemies became more sophisticated, the weapons of choice became more crafty, cruel and deadly.
The Macedonians became a great civilization due to the introduction of siege weapons. The Romans capitalized on their creations and crafted war as a strategic art ruled by precision.  The Chinese introduced gunpowder  in the  Middle Ages, which lead to a military strategy of propellent-based ordnances.  The art of war and death was screaming forward changing the scope of conquest and World power.
The crown jewel which would open the door to the threat of mass slaughter as a form of deterrent and change the tide of war.... the Atomic Bomb. World wars, dictators, rank and file soldiers would rise and fall on the creation of weapons of devastation.
So, after all the bombs have been dropped and the ashes have settled the question remains...is there any hope?
The Standard edition is the basic deck which has much more than any collector bargains for in a standard edition. Intricate details, beautiful composition and a great theme… this deck is one that you will not want to pass up.
Features:
Printed by the Legends Playing Card Co. 
54 Custom Cards
Each court, Ace and Joker cards will have original illustrations, capturing the feel of the era. 
The Cards will be printed on the Classic Finish, which is the highest quality card stock. 
Premium Matte Card Stock Box Unique Back Design
The Limited edition will include stunning red foil on a sturdy matte black tuck with crisp embossing. This deck will be the next step for those who are looking for a timeless piece of collectable art.
Features:
Printed by the Legends Playing Card Company 
 Each court card, Ace and Jokers will have original illustrations, capturing the feel of the era.

  Athena (Goddess of War Strategy)
Athena is the goddess of wisdom, courage, inspiration, civilization, law and justice, mathematics, strength, war strategy, the arts, crafts, and skill in ancient Greek religion and mythology. Minerva is the Roman goddess identified with Athena.
Athena is portrayed as a shrewd companion of heroes and is the patron goddess of heroic endeavor. She is the virgin patroness of Athens. The Athenians founded the Parthenon on the Acropolis of her namesake city, Athens (Athena Parthenos), in her honor.
Veneration of Athena was so persistent that archaic myths about her were recast to adapt to cultural changes. In her role as a protector of the city (polis), many people throughout the Greek world worshiped Athena as Athena Polias, frequently as their city-state patron goddess. While the city of Athens and the goddess Athena bear the same name (Athena the goddess, Athenai the city), it is not known which of the two words is derived from the other.
 Lancelot de Mole (Inventor of the Tank)
He made several approaches to the British authorities in 1912, in 1914 and 1916, in relation to what would become the tank. It was, obviously, ahead of its time; because, in 1912, the need for such a military device had not yet arisen. And, to further complicate matters, due to various bureaucratic blunders, his correspondence was set aside, and not given to the appropriate officers.
Eventually, in 1919, long after the military tank had been built and used in warfare during World War I, a Royal Commission recognized the importance of de Mole's innovative work, and noted the unfortunate consequences of his submissions being overlooked and, therefore, having no connection with the development of the tank at all, that a far better tank would have been developed than the one that the British eventually used, and that it would have been developed at a much earlier date.
Clara Barton (Founder of Red Cross)
Clarissa "Clara" Harlowe Barton (December 25, 1821 – April 12, 1912) was a pioneering nurse who founded the American Red Cross. She worked as a hospital nurse in the American Civil War, and as a teacher and patent clerk. Barton is noteworthy for doing humanitarian work at a time when relatively few women worked outside the home. She had a relationship with John J. Elwell, but never married. 
ANTON FOKKER
Anton Herman Gerard "Anthony" Fokker (6 April 1890 – 23 December 1939) was a Dutch aviation pioneer and an aircraft manufacturer. He is most famous for the fighter aircraft he produced in Germany during the First World War such as the Eindecker monoplanes, the Dr.1 triplane and the D.VII biplane.
At the outbreak of World War I the German government took control of the factory. Fokker remained as director and alleged designer of many aircraft for the Imperial German Army Air Service (Luftstreitkräfte), including the Fokker Eindecker and the Fokker Dr.I, the triplane made famous in the hands of aces such as Manfred von Richthofen (the Red Baron). In all, his company delivered about 700 military planes to the German air force as well as supplying the German navy and Austria-Hungary.
 The First Joker (The Atomic Bomb)
A thermonuclear weapon weighing little more than 2,400 pounds (1,100 kg) can produce an explosive force comparable to the detonation of more than 1.2 million tons (1.1 million tonnes) of TNT. A nuclear device no larger than traditional bombs can devastate an entire city by blast, fire, and radiation. Nuclear weapons are considered weapons of mass destruction, and their use and control have been a major focus of international relations policy since their debut.
Nuclear weapons have been used twice in nuclear warfare, both times by the United States against Japan near the end of World War II. On 6 August 1945, the U.S. Army Air Forces detonated a uranium gun-type fission bomb codenamed "Little Boy" over the Japanese city of Hiroshima; three days later, on 9 August, the U.S. Army Air Forces detonated a plutonium implosion-type fission bomb codenamed "Fat Man" over the Japanese city of Nagasaki. The bombings resulted in the deaths of approximately 200,000 civilians and military personnel from acute injuries sustained from the explosions. The ethics of the bombings and their role in Japan's surrender remain the subject of scholarly and popular debate.

updates.update_userinfo: New Edition to Devastation: DEVASTATION THE SILVER EDITION NOW ON KICKSTARTER!
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone,
Last week, I just launched my newest Kickstarter DEVASTATION THE SILVER EDITION.
It's a new edition to the Devastation series. This is also a Kickstarter exclusive, the amount printed will be a minimum of 1000 decks or the amount it will take to satisfy the fulfillment of the project. I am doing something new this time around, hand-signing and numbering a unique sleeve for each deck. The numbers will be based on the backer number, which I have never done before.
I hope that you would consider backing another edition. You can find the links below. Thank you all for you support.

Hello everyone!
Just a quick note. The Devastation project has completed. All of your rewards should have been received by now. If you have not received your reward, then consider the package lost and I will reship your reward. There are about 9 that I have on my list to reship and will be going out this week. For those who have not received their reward as of yet and you have not messaged me, please let me know by messaging me through Kickstarter and I will put you on the list to reship.

updates.update_userinfo: Signature Cards are in the Numbered decks.
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone, I just wanted you all to know that shipment of Devastation is still in full swing and you should be receiving your reward shortly. There has been some questions about the Signature cards. During production of the decks I made the decision to put the Signature cards into the numbered decks. I know many of you might not be opening the numbered decks, but just if you wanted to know, that is where your signature card is.
Please let me know once you get your rewards what you think. I hope you are as happy with your decks as I was.

THE DECKS ARE IN!
I want to give you all some good news. The Devastation playing cards have arrived at the warehouse. They are sorting through the shipment and the first batch of shipments should start going out by the end of next week. 
Thank you all for your patience. I found out that customs held up our shipment for about 2 weeks, which is never fun, but happens all the time.
